owned.name: compliancecheckresults.compliance.openshift.io
owned.description: ComplianceCheckResult represent a result of a single compliance "test"

owned.name: complianceremediations.compliance.openshift.io
owned.description: ComplianceRemediation represents a remediation that can be applied to the cluster to fix the found issues.

owned.name: compliancescans.compliance.openshift.io
owned.description: ComplianceScan represents a scan with a certain configuration that will be applied to objects of a certain entity in the host. These could be nodes that apply to a certain nodeSelector, or the cluster itself.

owned.name: compliancesuites.compliance.openshift.io
owned.description: ComplianceSuite represents a set of scans that will be applied to the cluster. These should help deployers achieve a certain compliance target.

owned.name: profilebundles.compliance.openshift.io
owned.description: ProfileBundle is the Schema for the profilebundles API

owned.name: profiles.compliance.openshift.io
owned.description: Profile is the Schema for the profiles API

owned.name: rules.compliance.openshift.io
owned.description: Rule is the Schema for the rules API

owned.name: scansettingbindings.compliance.openshift.io
owned.description: ScanSettingBinding is the Schema for the scansettingbindings API

owned.name: scansettings.compliance.openshift.io
owned.description: ScanSetting is the Schema for the scansettings API

owned.name: tailoredprofiles.compliance.openshift.io
owned.description: TailoredProfile is the Schema for the tailoredprofiles API

owned.name: variables.compliance.openshift.io
owned.description: Variable describes a tunable in the XCCDF profile

value.description: An operator which runs OpenSCAP and allows you to keep your cluster compliant with the security benchmark you need.
